headline: Linde Earns FTSE4Good Inclusion for Tenth Consecutive Year
summary: WOKING, England, July 24, 2025--Linde (Nasdaq: LIN) today announced its inclusion in the FTSE4Good Index Series for the tenth consecutive year, reaffirming Linde’s leadership in sustainable business practices and its commitment to environmental, social and governance (ESG) excellence.

content.title: Linde Earns FTSE4Good Inclusion for Tenth Consecutive Year
